title: Drawing, "Elevation of House for J. Gregory, Chelsea", 1807–10
medium: Graphite; pen and black ink; brush and gray, green and yellow wash on off white laid paper
inscribed: In pen and brown ink above image: Front designed for / John Gregory Esq. at / Chelsea.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description:
Front elevation of a house places on the lower portion of the sheet.
Inscription above..

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Elevation of House for J. Gregory, Chelsea", 1807–10.
1807–10. Graphite; pen and black ink; brush and gray, green and yellow wash on off white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1948-40-107.
